Question: He also blushes when she kisses him in There's No Time for Love, this person.
Hints: For instance, on April 15, 1953, Lucy tries to steal all of this person's caramels when he offers her one.
In the strip from July 24, 1990, in the storyline with Peggy Jean, Linus tells this person he is always in love.
For instance, in one strip, from May 9, 1951, this person says his raincoat is too small.
